trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Grand Junction
There were no other sightings in Grand Junction on or around August 3rd 2000
Summary: appeared to be saucer shaped/ I have a photo to be
divs: Sighting DetailsENTER My wife and I were on a backpacking trip for two weeks. I first noticedthe object when we stopped to take pictures of the mountains. I had no idea whatit couldve been exept some sort of ufo. I immediatly grabbed the camera andtook a picture. Its strange but I felt like I was being watched. Once I tookthe picture, I went to grab the binoculars and when I turned around it was gone.
